qas.question: What Japanese fleet was based in the Marshall Islands?
On what atoll was the 6th Fleet Forces Service based?
What was the mission of the 6th Fleet Forces Service?

context: In the months before the attack on Pearl Harbor, <a1_0>Kwajalein<a1_0/> Atoll was the administrative center of the Japanese <a0_0>6th Fleet<a0_0/> Forces Service, whose task was the <a2_0>defense of the Marshall Islands<a2_0/>.
